articles.author: Marissa R. Moss
articles.title: Jessica Simpson Finally Takes Control - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Jessica Simpson channeled the emotion of being scrutinized and criticized for her image, her romances, and more into new Americana songs.
articles.content: Jessica Simpson is sitting on a thrifted green banquette in her Nashville music room, wondering if Sister Rosetta Tharpe is trying to send us a message. We’d been talking about the late godmother of … [+15180 chars]
